feed.title: UUID to identify chains (payment protocol and elsewhere)

entry.title: UUID to identify chains (payment protocol and elsewhere)
entry.summary: Melvin Carvalho suggested that an out of band algo/hash could work if there was a one to one relationship between the described object and UUID. He also mentioned that in some cases, the gensis block may not uniquely identify a coin. However, Jeff Garzik countered this by saying that it seems unlikely for two different genesis blocks to have the same hash. Jeff Garzik works for exMULTI, Inc. and his email address is jgarzik@exmulti.com.
